name: Thalassic Fury
description: The plentiful waters serve as a cradle and a grave, merciful and merciless in equal measure.
effect: Followers of Kyogre may call upon 'Thalassic Fury' once per quest as a bonus action during their combat turn, allowing them to deal 4d6 Water-type damage to all enemies. This damage can benefit from STAB bonuses and type-effectiveness. This gains 1 additional damage die per rank bonus.
